note: Hi! I am a black 25-year-old female. I am asexual. I am currently in my second semester of college. My favorite color is black. I like to write stories about messed-up queer people. I can read morally grey stuff because it is fiction, and I can recognize that. I like nice, weird, or interesting people. I hate people who try to censor or police what queer people do. Especially when it comes from inside the community. Also, I'm shy and probably neurodivergent, so keep that in mind.
